Class SearchBrowse

  • java.lang.Object
    • SearchBrowse

  • public class SearchBrowse
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that stores all the resources that will be used for searching and browsing. The reserve operation is also done here.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kyriacos Mosphilis and Boris Andreev

                                                   java.util.ArrayList<Resource> currentList)
        Method that is used for searching using a specific keyword.
        Parameters:
        keyword - Is used to search for corresponding resources.
        currentList - List which is currently being displayed
        Returns:
        A list containing all the resources that have been filtered.

      • reserved

        public static void reserved(Resource resource)
        This method is called whenever a request for an item is made, however there are no copies free. It then proceeds to go through all of the borrowed date for the copies of the resource and add them to a list from which the earliest date is selected. The copy with date method is called which returns the copy object with that date. This copy has a due date set and is set as reserved for the requsting user.
        Parameters:
        resource - The item to be reserved.

      • copyWithDate

        public static Copy copyWithDate(Resource resource,
                                java.util.Date date)
        Goes through all of the copies of a resources and returns the one with a specific date borrowed.
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource trough which copies the loop runs through
        date - Specific date borrowed
        Returns:
        A copy with the specific date borrowed.
